title: Investigate tracking token usage per issue
description: Explore whether there's a way to determine/track token consumption (LLM tokens) per beads issue. Could help with cost awareness, effort estimation, and understanding which issues are most expensive to work on.
notes:
## Investigation Results: Token Usage Per Issue

### 7 Approaches Evaluated

| # | Approach | Accuracy | Effort | Viable? |
|---|----------|----------|--------|---------|
| 1 | **Proxy/Middleware** (ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL → local proxy) | Exact | Medium | Yes |
| 2 | **OpenTelemetry export** (CLAUDE_CODE_ENABLE_TELEMETRY) | Exact | Low-Med | Yes |
| 3 | **Claude Code Hooks** (tool-call counting + issue tagging) | Proxy only | Low | Yes |
| 4 | **Git heuristics** (lines changed, files touched per issue) | Low (tokens) | Low | Yes |
| 5 | **Billing API** (Anthropic Console, daily aggregates) | Aggregate | Low | Yes |
| 6 | **Agent SDK** (custom agent with usage callbacks) | Exact | High | Partial |
| 7 | **Session estimation** (/context parsing) | Very low | High | No |

### Recommended: Composite Architecture

**Layer 1 — OpenTelemetry (primary)**: Claude Code has built-in OTEL export:
- `claude_code.token.usage` metric (input/output/cacheRead/cacheCreation)
- `claude_code.cost.usage` metric (USD per request)
- Tagged with `session.id` + custom `OTEL_RESOURCE_ATTRIBUTES="issue_id=$BEADS_ACTIVE_ISSUE"`
- Export to OTLP collector, Prometheus, or console

**Layer 2 — Proxy (fallback/validation)**: Set `ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8787`, intercept SSE `message_stop` events, log usage per request to `.beads/token-usage.jsonl`.

**Layer 3 — Hooks (issue correlation)**: Post-tool hook writes `.beads/.current-issue` from `bd update --status in_progress` commands. OTEL/proxy reads active issue ID from this file.

**Layer 4 — Git heuristics (complexity proxy)**: Lines changed per issue from git log between status transitions. Complements token data with "output size" metric.

### Beads Already Supports This

- `bd update <id> --metadata '{"tokens": N, "cost_usd": 0.05}'` — per-issue JSON metadata field (v0.49.2+)
- `bd audit record` — append-only interaction logging to `.beads/interactions.jsonl`
- `.beads/hooks/on_close` — lifecycle hooks for running aggregation scripts
- Events export — mutation event stream for correlating status changes with time windows

### Key Prerequisite: Validate ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL

Must confirm Claude Code respects this env var for proxy routing. If not, OTEL becomes the sole exact-token path.

### Story Points + Token Efficiency Formula

Once both story points (bw-6gw epic) and token tracking are in place:
- `tokens_per_story_point = total_tokens / story_points`
- `cost_per_story_point = total_cost_usd / story_points`
- `developer_efficiency = story_points_closed / total_tokens` (across all issues)
